offerDetailsList.termsAndConditons:
•  Offer is applicable only on TCP App or on Westside stores
  •  This offer cannot be clubbed with any other existing offers
  •  The offer can be availed only once per user
  •  In case of product return, the offer received will be deducted from the total bill value
  •  In case of product return, amount will be refunded to the customer via the same payment instrument used during purchase
  •  In case of product return, loyalty points awarded to the customer will be cancelled
  •  Offer is valid only until stock last
  •   TCP & Westside reserve the rights to amend the T&C, end the offer, or call back any of the offers without prior notice
offerDetailsList.availSteps:
•  Collect the offer from TCP App
  •  Click on ‘Shop Now’ and select products of your choice associated with the offer OR Walk into any Westside store and select products of your choice associated with the offer.
  •  Offer is auto-applied at payment counter
offerDetailsList.title: Nuon Tshirt​
